name: Play it again Sam 3
overview: A compilation of 4 games: Commando an action shooter for 1 or 2 players. It was written by Trevor Harwood and John Nixon and was originally released in 1985 by Elite/Encore. Killer Gorilla a single player platformer. It was written by Adrian Stephens and was originally released in 1983 by Micro Power. Killer Gorilla 2 (aka Zany Kong Junior) a single player platformer. It was written by Christopher Hyde and was originally released in 1984 by Superior Software as Zany Kong Junior. Palace of Magic a single player arcade adventure. It was written by Martyn Howard and was originally released in 1986 by Micro Power.
